RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Professor Doutor da Faculdade de Direito da Universidade de Sгo Paulo - USP, Largo de Sгo Francisco, Departamento de Direito Civil. Bacharel em Direito, com especializaзгo em Direito Privado e Processo Civil, pela Faculdade de Direito da Universidade de Sгo Paulo - USP (1996). Mestre em Anбlise Econфmica do Direito pelo Institut fьr Recht und Цkonomik, Universitдt Hamburg, Alemanha (2003). Doutorado em Direito Civil pela Faculdade de Direito da Universidade de Sгo Paulo - USP (2005). Erasmus Programme in Law and Economics na George Mason University School of Law, Washington D.C., EUA (2002), e na Facoltа di Economia, Universitа di Bologna, Itбlia (2003). Pesquisador em Direito Civil, Responsabilidade Civil, Direito Agrбrio, Direito e Medicina e Anбlise Econфmica do Direito. Advogado em Sгo Paulo.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Doctor Professor at the University of Sгo Paulo Law School, Brazil, Department of Civil Law. LL.B. - University of Sгo Paulo Law School, Brazil (1996), LL.M. in Law and Economics - Hamburg University, Germany (2003). Ph.D. in Civil Law - University of Sгo Paulo Law School, Brazil (2005). Erasmus Programme in Law and Economics - George Mason University School of Law, Washington D.C., USA (2002), Facoltа di Economia, Universitа di Bologna, Italy (2003). Has experience in civil law, acting on the following subjects: civil law, torts, "law and medicine" and "law and economics". Lawyer in Sгo Paulo, Brazil.

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Dimensхes jurнdicas da personalidade na ordem constitucional brasileira

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Abstract: Property is not the fundamental institute of civil law. Therefore, the human being is the center, not only of civil law, but the whole law itself. For the human being protection, in the most basic and fundamental conception, the law uses, mostly, the personality rights theory and fundamental rights. Meanwhile, today, both theories are straightly connected by the studies of civil law as the Federal Constitution: the constitutional civil law. As the civil law traditional point of view, the human being protection in this study, must be founded in the text of the Civil Code, and also devices that treat the personality rights. However, as the constitutional civil law, the most important text is the Federal Constitution itself, and there are fundamental rights for the protection of human being, which must applied together with the personality rights. An example of this interpretation is the application of the right to health (fundamental right provided in the Federal Constitutional) for the protection of human being physical integrity (personality right provided in the Civil Code). Applying the fundamental right to health in relations between individuals, there is legal basis for a broader protection to human being, restoring not only moral damages, but also, the corporal injuries or aesthetic form itself (as does the Superior Court of Justice).
